activities.activity.editor.name: Editor
activities.activity.graph.name: Graph
activities.activity.checkboxes.name: Checkboxes
activities.activity.settings.name: Settings
activities.activity.welcome-page.name: Welcome page
status-bar.caret-position.title: The caret is located on character {{charNumber}} of line {{lineNumber}}
core.errors.range-error.content: Requested caret position out of bounds (line {{lineNumber}}, char {{charNumber}})
core.settings.appearance.theme: Theme::Let the darkness (or the lightness?) be with you
core.settings.graph.show-folders: Show folders::Turn this on to make graphs show the full filesystem hierarchy including folders
core.settings.graph.show-tags: Show tags::Turn this on to make graphs show tags used in files
core.settings.graph.show-links: Show links::Turn this on to make graphs show links between files. Links will be shown as dashed lines, embeds will be shown as solid lines
core.settings.editor.show-line-numbers: Show line numbers::You would probably need line numbers - they are so convenient!
core.settings.editor.always-show-markdow: Always show Markdown symbols::Those hashes and stars may be annoying, but seeing them is near and dear to many hearts
core.settings.file-explorer: File Explorer::Stuff related to working with files
core.settings.file-explorer.exclude: Ignore files and folders::Beware of the dragons! üêâ
core.settings.file-explorer.associations: Associate file type with extension::Beware of the dragons! üêâ
core.settings.file-explorer.confirm-dele: Confirm removal::Show the annoying alert asking if you are sure you know what you are doing
core.settings.file-explorer.confirm-move: Confirm moving and renaming::Show the annoying alert asking if you are sure you know what you are doing
